Desc.entry: Dr John Y Yang tutors in maths at GCSE, A level and higher (university level). Can also tutor in ICT (including Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Publisher, the use of the internet and Email). Physics up to A-level, as well as Chinese language (Mandarin). With more than 20 years experiences in secondary, further and higher education. Qualifications BSc, MEng, PhD & PGCE. Can travel to student's home within 10 miles radius from his home (including Crosspool, Crookes, Fulwood, Ecclesall, Millhouses, Dore, Whirlow, Walkley and the City Centre) or accepts students in his home.
